mapper.select: SELECT tb.id,tb.class_id,tb.member_id,tb.created_at, tc.title,tc.introduce,tc.price, tc.file_path,tc.file_name,tc.file_ext, tt.name from tbl_basket as tb inner join tbl_class as tc on tb.class_id = tc.id inner join tbl_teacher as tt on tc.teacher_id = tt.id where member_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_basket (class_id, member_id, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{member_id}, NOW())
